sentences.en: 'Aye,'said he,'by thunder, but I wanted some o'that!'
sentences.cn: “ 啊, ” 他说, “ 说真的, 刚才我就缺几口这玩意儿. ”

sentences.en: All in favor of this proposition will please say "Aye".
sentences.cn: 请所有赞成这项提议的人讲一声 “赞成” .

sentences.en: Aye -- that is because you have the right disposition.
sentences.cn: 啊, 那是因为你的性格好.

sentences.en: Aye , aye , sir, I'll do it out of hand.
sentences.cn: 是, 长官, 我马上去办.

sentences.en: Aye, aye , sir, I know your worship loves no holiday speeches.
sentences.cn: 是, 是, 长官.我知道长官不喜欢听奉承话.

sentences.en: Aye, Drink up, then, and I'll see you through the lock.
sentences.cn: 好,喝茶吧, 喝完后我送你过闸门.

sentences.en: Aye, fight and you may die, run and you'll live.
sentences.cn: 战斗也许会令你死去, 逃避后你却定能生存, 至少暂时能活命.

sentences.en: Aye, you shall be together even in the silent memory of God.
sentences.cn: 是,在静默念着造化中, 你们还将在一起.

sentences.en: Better a finger off than aye wagging.
Captain Henry swallowed his astonishment and said, " Aye aye, sir. "
sentences.cn: 亨利上校强压下自己的震惊,说: “ 是,是, 先生. ”

sentences.en: Everyone in favor of the amendment, say "aye!"
sentences.cn: 所有赞成修改章程的，请说“赞成”！

sentences.en: I have the king of France's commission in my pocket, which would aye be some protection.
sentences.cn: 我口袋里有着法国国王的委任状, 也许这对我还起一点保护作用吧.

sentences.en: I thought,'Aye aye, hit it before he comes and clatters me.
sentences.cn: 我想, '埃赞成, 击出他来之前和clatters我.

sentences.en: Och aye. I always liked him.
sentences.cn: 口欧耶，我一直都很喜欢他。

sentences.en: The mother's breath is aye sweet.
sentences.cn: 母亲的低语总是甜蜜的.

sentences.en: The Senate vote was 89 to 11, with 37 Democrats voting aye and only one Republican voting nay. Reaganomics had officially begun.
sentences.cn: 参议员以89票对11票表决通过，赞成票中包括37位民主党议员，只有一位共和党议员投了反对票。

sentences.en: XXXX: Aye , pretty good! people, food. But one thing is not good.
sentences.cn: 当然 啦, 非常喜欢! 喜欢这里的人和这里的食物. 但是有一点不是很喜欢.

phrases.tran_cn: （表惊喜或自己猜疑等得到证实时说）原来如此；[航]（海员等回答上级命令时说）明白

trans.tran_en: used to say yes when voting
The ayes are the people who vote in favour of something
